article:
A 'direct relationship' is mathematically defined as a direct
proportion Weisstein, Eric W. "Directly Proportional." From MathWorld--A
Wolfram Web Resource.
http://mathworld.wolfram.com/DirectlyProportional.html between two
mathematical variables. It means that one variable is directly proportional to
the other. The two variables x and y are directly proportional if and only if
y=kÂ·x for some constant k.
